description: Detects suspicious DNS error messages that indicate a fatal or suspicious error that could be caused by exploiting attempts Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Named Error
query: (*\ dropping\ source\ port\ zero\ packet\ from\ * OR *\ denied\ AXFR\ from\ * OR *\ exiting\ \(due\ to\ fatal\ error\)*)
